definition: Ghost Festival on 15th day of 7th lunar month when offerings are made to the deceased

sentences.english: Medium yuan of section in the evening, also be Li Kemeng 77 " day of revive from death " .
sentences.chinese: 中元節晚上，也是李可萌的七七“還魂日”。

sentences.english: That day was July 15 on the lunar calendar, the day of the Ghost Festival.
sentences.chinese: 當天，正巧是農曆七月十五日中元節。

sentences.english: The day after tomorrow is a traditional Chinese folk festival "Hungry Ghost".
sentences.chinese: 後天是中國民間傳統“中元節”。

sentences.english: The origin of the Hungry Ghost Festival and the Ghost Month in China is uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 中元節是否起源於中國並不確定。
